title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When attempting to refresh an image by importing a new version of 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the expected behavior is not met as the original image remains displayed.
OB: After importing 'image1.jpg' again into the layout, the original image is still displayed.
EB: Importing the new version of 'image1.jpg' should result in the new image being displayed in the layout, replacing the original image.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the layout where 'image1.jpg' is displayed.
3. Import a new version of 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
